resources.string: Information about\n the rules of the game:
Choose in your\n opinion the\n fastest animal!
And make a run!\n Check who is the king of\n the beasts in terms of speed.

If your chosen animal is the
 first to reach the finish line,
 you made the right choice
 and will receive a
 well-deserved bonus)

In the results of the game,
 the history of the races will
 be saved and the king of the
 beasts will be determined!
Set how many beasts\n participate in the race!
Animal run one on one.\n Find out which one is stronger.
Three predators will fight\n for the rule of these lands.
Incredible battle! The most\n suitable opportunity to defeat everyone!
The king of beasts\n and wards:
